```{r}
f1 <- factor( c("small", "large", "large", "small", "medium") )
print(f1)
f2 <- factor( c( 'a', 'b', 'c',  'a', 'a') )
print(f2)
x <- c(10.1, 10.2, 10.3, 10.5, 10.5)
```

create data frame

```{r}
df <- data.frame(x, f1, f2)
df
```


```{r}
levels( df$f1)
```


```{r}
variableOfInterest <- "f1"
print(df[variableOfInterest] )
print( levels( df[variableOfInterest][,1] ) )

```


```{r}
df[variableOfInterest][,1] <- relevel( df[variableOfInterest][,1], "small")
df
```
```{r}
levels( df[variableOfInterest][,1] )
```
